topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1: Deploy the Horizon Patch 3

body.p: This patch includes updated python-ceilometerclient and python-neutronclient for Horizon to support KVM region patch 7 fixes.

This patch addresses a number of issues in the KVM region, including:
In Horizon UI, clicking on "Resource Usage" panel results in a crash
Prerequisites: - HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1 cloud has already been deployed
body.section:
Downloading the Horizon PatchDownload the patch Horizon001_Patch003 and extract the HCG-horizon-updatedclients directory.
Verify the downloaded signature and the downloaded checksums.

section.title: Deploy the Horizon Patch for the lifecycle manager host

ol.li: SSH into the lifecycle manager host as the root user.

Log into the lifecycle manager VM as root.ssh <lifecycle manager_VM_IP>
where: lifecycle manager_VM_IP is the CLM IP of the lifecycle manager. Locate the IP address for the lifecycle manager in the /root/infra-ansible-playbooks/group_vars/all file under hlm_clmstaticip field.
Copy the HCG-horizon-updatedclients directory to the /var/hlm/clouds/<cloudname>/patches directory on the lifecycle manager VM.
Execute following command to apply patch: hlm patch -c <cloud-name> -n HCG-horizon-updatedclients -t <tier> Example: hlm patch -c cloud1 -n HCG-horizon-updatedclients -t BASE-CCP-T1
